Package game

Class Game

java.lang.Object
game.Game
public class Game extends Object
My Game Main Entry Point. This Class Represents The Games Main Entry Point and control. consists and manages the initialisations, transitions and interfaces

  • Constructor Details

    • Game

      public Game()
      Initialise a new Game. Creates the main menu and starts the game if the play button is pressed.

  • Method Details

    • startGame

      public void startGame()
      Method to Initialise and start the Game

    • isNextLevel

      public void isNextLevel()
      Method that Handles the Transition to the Next Level and to Make sure if the Level need to go to Next Level. Updates the Game and Stops the current level. Initiates a Game Complete Panel is the Last level is true.

    • goToNextLevel

      public void goToNextLevel()
      Proceeds to the next level of the game. Initializes the next level and updates the game view, Warrior.

    • main

      public static void main(String[] args)
      Run the game. Main method to run the game.

    • isLastLevel

      public boolean isLastLevel()
      Getter for the isLastLevel flag.
      Returns:
      True if the current level is the last level, otherwise false.

    • setLastLevel

      public void setLastLevel(boolean lastLevel)
      Setter for the isLastLevel flag.
      Parameters:
      lastLevel - True if the current level is the last level, otherwise false.
